viewData.name: ASUS 17.3" Republic of Gamers Strix Scar Edition GL703GE Laptop
viewData.short_description: Buy ASUS 17.3" Republic of Gamers Strix Scar Edition GL703GE Laptop featuring 2.2 GHz Intel Core i7-8750H Six-Core, 16GB DDR4 RAM | 128GB SSD + 1TB SSHD 17.3" 1920 x 1080 120 Hz Display. Review ASUS Strix Scar
viewData.long_description: Built as an economy model, the 17.3" Republic of Gamers Strix Scar Edition GL703GE Laptop from ASUS is designed for gaming, thanks to an NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti graphics card with 4GB of GDDR5 RAM, a Full HD 1920 x 1080 display, a 120 Hz refresh rate, a response time of 5 ms (GtG), wide viewing angles, and 94% NTSC color gamut coverage. The core of this system is driven by a 2.2 GHz Intel Core i7-8750H processor, which can be overclocked up to 4.1 GHz, plus 16GB of 2666 MHz DDR4 RAM. Storage is provided by a 128GB NVMe PCIe SSD and a 1TB Seagate FireCuda Solid-State Hybrid Drive (SSHD) with 8GB of cache. The GL703GE has also been built with 802.11ac Wi-Fi and a 4-zone RGB keyboard. The installed operating systems are Windows 10 Home (64-bit) and PureOS. Included is an AC adapter and protection is provided by a limited 1-year warranty and one year of accidental damage protection (ADP).
